name: Quick Reaction Force
description:
Welcome to the Quick Reaction Force,
In this world there is a virus that causes many people to loose their humanity. You have been assigned a free zone as per the contract signed upon joining the Quick Reaction Force. As part of the contract you are allowed to be given missions where you are to gather resources so you can make your home base as secure as possible. While on missions it is recommended to look for survivors who are immune or uninfected by the T-R965 Retrovirus. But be warned that you should also watch out because those that seam uninfected could be in the incubation period of the virus. 

Current Implemented Features
Simple Building System
Simple Character Creator
Working Save/load system

Next Release Features
Fix some GUI layout issues
Custom Logging Feature
Inventory UI
Equipment UI

Possible Additional Features
Additional Buildable Objects
